game.name: Bottle Cap Match
game.description: A classic match-3 game, but this time with cool colourful bottlecaps to match! Set the best score you can and see how you stack up to the rest of the world!
game.metaTitle: Bottle Cap Match, Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Bottle Cap Match at atmegame.com ! We have selected this games for best excitement and thrill in you!
game.metaKeyword: Bottle Cap Match Game, Action Games, Game, Online Games, Play Free Games, Flash Games, Browser Game
game.mobileControlKeys: SWIPE THE COLOR DOTS . MAKE A MATCH AT LEAST 3 SAME COLOR DOTS
game.webControlKeys: SWIPE THE COLOR DOTS WITH L CLICK OF MOUSE. MAKE A MATCH AT LEAST 3 SAME COLOR DOTS
